Verses: 1 yordhaanukku Ippuraththile Malaigalilum Pallaththaakkugalilum Leebanonukku Edhiraana Periya Samuththiraththin Karaiyoramengumulla Eththiyarum Emoriyarum Kaanaaniyarum Perisiyarum Eviyarum Eboosiyarumaanavargaludaiya Sagala Raajaakkalum Adhaikkelvippattapodhu,
2 avargal Orumanappattu, Yosuvaavodum Isravelarodum Yuththampanna Egamaaikkoodinaargal.
3 erigovukkum Aayikkum Yosuvaa Seydhadhai Gibiyonin Kudigal Kelvippattapodhu,

4 oru Thandhiramaana Yosanaipanni, Thangalai Sthaanaapadhigalpola Kaanbiththu, Pazhaiya Rattu Paigalaiyum, Peeralum Poththalumaana Pazhaiya Thiraatcharasa Thuruththigalaiyum Thangal Kazhudhaigalmel Vaiththu,

5 pazhudhupaarkkappatta Pazhaiya Paadharatchaigalai Thangal Kaalgalil Pottu, Pazhaiya Vasthirangalai Uduththikkondaargal; Vazhikku Avargal Kondupona Appamellaam Ularndhadhum Poosanam Pooththadhumaayirundhadhu.
6 avargal Gilgaalil Irukkira Paalayaththukku Yosuvaavinidaththil Poi, Avanaiyum Isravel Manusharaiyum Nokki: Naangal Dhooradhesaththilirundhu Vandhavargal, Engalode Udanbadikkaipannungal Endraargal.
7 appozhudhu Isravel Manushar Andha Eviyarai Nokki: Neengal Engal Naduvile Kudiyirukkiravargalaakkum; Naangal Eppadi Ungalode Udanbadikkaipannalaam Endraargal.
8 avargal Yosuvaavai Nokki: Naangal Umakku Adimaigal Endraargal; Adharku Yosuvaa: Neengal Yaar, Engeyirundhu Vandheergal Endru Kettaan.

9 adharku Avargal: Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Naamaththin Pirasthaabaththai Kettu, Umadhu Adiyaaraagiya Naangal Vegu Dhooradhesaththilirundhu Vandhom; Avarudaiya Keerththiyaiyum, Avar Egipthile Seydha Yaavaiyum,
10 avar Esponin Raajaavaagiya Seekonum Astharoththilirundha Paasaanin Raajaavaagiya Okum Engira Yordhaanukku Appuraththilirundha Emoriyarin Irandu Raajaakkalukkum Seydha Yaavaiyum Kelvippattom.

11 aagaiyaal, Engal Moopparum Engal Dhesaththu Kudigalellaarum Engalai Nokki: Ungal Kaigalil Vazhikku Aagaaram Eduththukkondu, Avargalukku Edhirgondupoi, Avargalidaththil Naangal Ungal Adiyaar, Engalode Udanbadikkai Pannavendum Endru Sollasonnaargal.

12 ungalidaththil Vara Naangal Purappadugira Andre, Engal Vazhippirayaanaththukku Indha Appaththai Sudasuda Engal Veettilirundhu Eduththukkonduvandhom; Ippozhudhu Idho, Ularndhu Poosanam Pooththirukkiradhu.

13 naangal Indha Thiraatcha Thuruththigalai Nirappugaiyil Pudhidhaayirundhadhu; Aanaalum, Idho, Kizhindhupoyitru; Engal Vasthirangalum Paadharatchaigalum Nedundhooramaana Pirayaanaththinaale Pazhasaaippoyitru Endraargal.
14 appozhudhu Isravelar: Karththarudaiya Vaakkai Kelaamal Avargaludaiya Bojanapadhaarththaththil Siridhu Vaangikkondaargal.
15 yosuvaa Avargalode Samaadhaanampanni, Avargalai Uyirode Kaappaatrum Udanbadikkaiyai Avargalode Panninaan; Adharkaaga Sabaiyin Pirabukkal Avargalukku Aanaiyittu Koduththaargal.
16 avargalode Udanbadikkaipanni, Moondrunaal Sendrapinbu, Avargal Thangal Ayalaar Endrum Thangal Naduve Kudiyirukkiravargal Endrum Kelvippattaargal.
17 isravel Puththirar Pirayaanampannugaiyil, Moondraamnaalil Avargal Pattanangalukku Vandhaargal; Andha Pattanangal Kibiyon, Kepiraa, Peyerodh, Keeriyaadhyeyaareem Enbavaigal.

18 sabaiyin Pirabukkal Avargalukku Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarperilaanaiyittirundhapadiyinaal, Isravel Puththirar Avargalai Sangaarampannavillai; Aanaalum Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Pirabukkalmel Murumuruththaargal.
19 appozhudhu Sagala Pirabukkalum, Sabaiyaar Yaavaraiyum Nokki: Naangal Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarperil Avargalukku Aanaiyittu Koduththom; Aadhalaal Avargalai Naam Thoda Koodaadhu.
20 kadungobam Nammel Varaadhabadikku, Naam Avargalukku Itta Aanaiyinimiththam Naam Avargalai Uyirode Vaiththu, Avargalukku Ondru Seyvom.

21 pirabukkalaagiya Naangal Avargalukku Sonnabadi Avargal Uyirodirundhu, Sabaiyaar Ellaarukkum Viragu Vettugiravargalaagavum, Thanneer Edukkiravargalaagavum Irukkakkadavargal Endru Pirabukkal Avargalode Sonnaargal.
22 pinbu Yosuvaa Avargalai Azhaippiththu: Neengal Engal Naduve Kudiyirukkumbodhu, Naangal Ungalukku Vegudhooramaayirukkiravargal Endru Solli, Engalai Vanjiththadhu Enna?

23 ippodhum Neengal Sabikkappattavargal; En Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukku Viraguvettugiravargalum, Thanneer Edukkiravargalumaana Panividaikkaararaayiruppeergal; Indha Oozhiyam Ungalaivittu Neengamaattaadhu Endraan.

24 avargal Yosuvaavukku Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Dhesaththaiyellaam Ungalukku Oppukkodukkavum, Dhesaththin Kudigalaiyellaam Ungalukku Munbaaga Azhikkavum Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thamadhu Dhaasanaagiya Mosekku Kattalaiyittadhu Umadhu Adiyaarukku Nichchayamaagave Arivikkappattadhinaal, Naangal Engal Jeevannimiththam Ungalukku Migavum Bayandhu, Indha Kaariyaththai Seydhom.
25 ippodhum Idho, Umadhu Kaiyilirukkirom. Ummudaiya Paarvaikku Nanmaiyum Niyaayamumaai Thondrugirabadi Engalukku Seyyum Endraargal.
26 appadiye Yosuvaa Avargalukku Seydhu, Isravel Puththirar Avargalai Kondrupodaadhabadikku, Avargalai Ivargal Kaikku Thappuviththaan.

27 innaalmattum Irukkirabadiye, Annaalil Avargalai Sabaikkum, Karththardherindhukollum Idaththilirukkum Avarudaiya Balibeedaththukkum Viragu Vettugiravargalaagavum Thanneer Edukkiravargalaagavumaakkinaan.
